name: King of Slimes (Vespir Belmont)
description:
Consume and grow!
Consume objects and other creatures to grow and gain attributes from them!

This was originally proof of concept created in a few hours! It was for the Mini Jam 113. Growing with each update!

//CONTROLS//
To consume jump on top of an object and press the X key or the LEFT button on controller (Square, X, Y) and mash to consume! You can fail these but the consequence isn't really there.

Let me know what you think in the discussion boards!!
